text: An la jiang shile zuimei de yanci, yi bu neirong yinhui, chaofan qie fanfu shenshu de jingdian [“gulanjing”].[Dang youren songdu “gulanjing” huo tingjian qi songdu sheng shi] fan weiju tamen de zhu de ren de jifu jiang wei ci er chandou. Ranhou, tamen de jifu he xin jiang yin zan nian an la er bian de rouhe. Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi an la de zhengdao, ta yi ci yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao [zhu]. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou yindao zhe.
